subject: Football
Assaults
lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh Steelers linebacker James Harrison has been charged with assaulting his girlfriend. Harrison was arrested Saturday after hitting 29-year-old Beth Tibbott at her home in Ohio Township, which is just outside Pittsburgh, according to a police affidavit. Harrison, 29, of Franklin Park, was arraigned on charges of simple assault and criminal mischief. He was released on his own recognizance pending a preliminary hearing Thursday.
